title: cmd/go: get does not expand env variables on Windows
body: Title says it all. I have a directory with my code in "%USERPROFILE%". Let me call it Dev. I made a environment variable called "%DEV%" to make it easier to access the dir. %GOPATH% is "%DEV%\Go". When I use "go get" it does not expand "%DEV%" to "%USERPROFILE%\Dev" or "C:\Users\user\Dev" but downloads sources to "%USERPROFILE%\\%DEV\%".
